Pholk Skin Nectar, Featherlight Cucumber (2020 formulation)

Brand: Pholk Beauty

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: Cucumber seed oil, Hemp Seed Oil,Infused Forsythia root, Honeysuckle petals, Job tears, clary sage and rose geranium essential oils

Directions: Smooth 1-2 drops in upward strokes onto cleansed face and neck. For a lightweight

k. For a lightweight and healthy glow try it as a natural luminizer on cheekbones and clavical.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
